title: A Week In The Life, Vol 21. Memorial Day Weekend!
description: One of my most favorite weeks of the year! And we had a packed one. On Monday I got to go on Emilia’s field trip. We went to a dairy farm and it was awesome. Super fun learning about everything! Festive season. The kids’ favorite night. I put this in front of them and they […] The post A Week In The Life, Vol 21. Memorial Day Weekend! appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: One of my most favorite weeks of the year! And we had a packed one. On Monday I got to go on Emilia’s field trip. We went to a dairy farm and it was awesome. Super fun learning about everything! Festive season. The kids’ favorite night. I put this in front of them and they […]
text: One of my most favorite weeks of the year! And we had a packed one. On Monday I got to go on Emilia’s field trip. We went to a dairy farm and it was awesome. Super fun learning about everything! Festive season. The kids’ favorite night. I put this in front of them and they all eat 2 to 3 tacos each. We also had our school field day… which got rained out and ended up in the gym. Hockey always! Obsessed with this boy. End of school conferences! Love. Got a hot chocolate and muffin treat! Max requested legit breakfast. Still making my lemon butter chicken from everyday dinners constantly. Baby Lucy! She is absolutely obsessed with Max. Snacks I made for the weekend. And red white and blue candy salad. The real MVP of the snacks though. Cousin lunch. Today we went to our annual memorial day parade. Parade ready! Red white and blue! Cousins brought donuts! Almost all the cousins. Our weather has been so beautiful this weekend! Jordy looooves watching this. Then more snacks. And all the picnic food! Summer food season! Cutie cousons. Just a casual cook. And now we’re into our last few days of school!
html:
One of my most favorite weeks of the year!

And we had a packed one.

On Monday I got to go on Emilia’s field trip.

We went to a dairy farm and it was awesome.

Super fun learning about everything!

Festive season.

The kids’ favorite night. I put this in front of them and they all eat 2 to 3 tacos each.

We also had our school field day… which got rained out and ended up in the gym.

Hockey always!

Obsessed with this boy.

End of school conferences!

Love.

Got a hot chocolate and muffin treat!

Max requested legit breakfast.

Still making my lemon butter chicken from everyday dinners constantly.

Baby Lucy!

She is absolutely obsessed with Max.

Snacks I made for the weekend.

And red white and blue candy salad.

The real MVP of the snacks though.

Cousin lunch.

Today we went to our annual memorial day parade.

Parade ready!

Red white and blue!

Cousins brought donuts!

Almost all the cousins.

Our weather has been so beautiful this weekend!

Jordy looooves watching this.

Then more snacks.

And all the picnic food!

Summer food season!

Cutie cousons.

Just a casual cook. And now we’re into our last few days of school!
